overview:
David Harper also co-founded PercentMobile. PercentMobile is a hosted mobile analytics service that makes your mobile audience and opportunities clear.

David Harper co-founded the New York chapter of Helsinki-based Mobile Monday. Mobile Monday is NY’s premiere mobile network and authority for the media, financial, and advertising industries. Mobile Monday NY, Inc. is a 501(c)(6) not-for-profit corporation. David is an active member of the Mobile Marketing Associations (MMA).

As founder of Engagelogic Corp â€“ a privately held, NY-based software development and early-stage venture firm â€“ David Harper has more than 20 years experience as an entrepreneur, patent holding inventor, and technologist.

In 2001, David Harper founded Winksite â€“ a mobile content management and social networking software company whose solutions connect publishers to their audiences and audience members to each other.

David Harper has successfully founded several software companies, one of which was sold to an investment bank after growing it from scratch to millions in revenues. During this time he served on the board of the Long Island Advertising Club and his interactive ad agency was a 4As member. David Harper has also been instrumental in capital raises and P&L for companies under management.

David co-authored several chapters in Politics to Go â€“ a handbook on the political uses of mobile technology that anthologizes over 50 of todayâ€™s top names in technology and politics. The Politics to Go handbook was published by the Institute for Politics, Democracy & the Internet (IPDI) at The George Washington Universityâ€™s Graduate School of Political Management. His focus was on the use of mobile technology to reach the 18-34 yr old audience.
